Product Models¶

class products.models.Product(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Products Model

Parameters

  • id (AutoField) – Id

  • seller (ForeignKey to User) – Seller. creator of product from user model - must be admin

  • price (FloatField) – Price. price of product in chosen currency - must be gt 0

  • name (CharField) – Name. product name

  • is_deleted (BooleanField) – Is deleted

  • currency (ForeignKey to Currency) – Currency. currency of the product

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

override save function to ensure validations
